  13. class MultiSelectFormField(forms.MultipleChoiceField):
  14. widget = forms.CheckboxSelectMultiple
  16. def clean(self, value):
  17. if not value and self.required:
  18. raise forms.ValidationError(self.error_messages['required'])
  19. return value
  22. class MultiSelectField(models.Field):
  23. __metaclass__ = models.SubfieldBase
  25. def get_internal_type(self):
  26. return "CharField"
  28. def get_choices_default(self):
  29. return self.get_choices(include_blank=False)
  31. def formfield(self, **kwargs):
  32. # don't call super, as that overrides default widget if it has choices
  33. defaults = {'required': not self.blank,
  34. 'label': capfirst(self.verbose_name),
  35. 'help_text': self.help_text, 'choices': self.choices}
  36. if self.has_default():
  37. defaults['initial'] = self.get_default()
  38. defaults.update(kwargs)
  39. return MultiSelectFormField(**defaults)
  41. def get_prep_value(self, value):
  42. return value
  44. def get_db_prep_value(self, value, connection=None, prepared=False):
  45. if isinstance(value, basestring):
  46. return value
  47. elif isinstance(value, list):
  48. return ",".join(value)
  50. def to_python(self, value):
  51. if value is not None:
  52. return value if isinstance(value, list) else value.split(',')
  53. return ''
  55. def contribute_to_class(self, cls, name):
  56. super(MultiSelectField, self).contribute_to_class(cls, name)
  57. if self.choices:
  58. func = lambda self, fieldname = name, choicedict = dict(
  59. self.choices): ",".join([choicedict.get(
  60. value, value) for value in getattr(self, fieldname)])
  61. setattr(cls, 'get_%s_display' % self.name, func)
  63. def validate(self, value, model_instance):
  64. arr_choices = self.get_choices_selected(self.get_choices_default())
  65. for opt_select in value:
  66. if opt_select not in arr_choices:
  67. raise exceptions.ValidationError(
  68. self.error_messages['invalid_choice'] % value)
  69. return
  71. def get_choices_selected(self, arr_choices=''):
  72. if not arr_choices:
  73. return False
  74. list = []
  75. for choice_selected in arr_choices:
  76. list.append(choice_selected[0])
  77. return list
  79. def value_to_string(self, obj):
  80. value = self._get_val_from_obj(obj)
  81. return self.get_db_prep_value(value)
  84. from south.modelsinspector import add_introspection_rules
  85. add_introspection_rules([], ["^event_rsvp\.models\.MultiSelectField"])
  88. class Event(models.Model):
  89. """
  90. Model to create event templates for recurring events etc.
  92. :created_by: User, who owns this template.
  93. :creation_date: Date of the template creation.
  94. :title: Title of the template.
  95. :description: Description of the template.
  96. :start: Starting date of the event.
  97. :end: Ending date of the event.
  98. :venue: The event location.
  99. :street: Street of the event location.
  100. :city: City of the event location.
  101. :zip: ZIP code of the event location.
  102. :country: Country of the event location.
  103. :contact_person: Name of a person to contact.
  104. :contact_email: Email of a person to contact.
  105. :contact_phone: Phone of a person to contact.
  106. :available_seats: Amount of seats available for this event.
  107. :hide_available_seats: Checkfield to hide the information about available
  108. seats in the templates.
  109. :max_seats_per_guest: Maximum amount of seats per guest.
  110. :allow_anonymous_rsvp: Checkbox to allow anonymous responses.
  111. :required_fields: Checkbox to select required guest fields.
  112. :template_name: Name can be set, if this event should be reusable.
  113. :is_published: Checkbox to publish/unpublish an event.
  115. """
  116. created_by = models.ForeignKey(
  117. 'auth.User',
  118. verbose_name=_('Created by'),
  119. )
  121. creation_date = models.DateTimeField(
  122. auto_now_add=True,
  123. verbose_name=_('Creation date'),
  124. )
  126. title = models.CharField(
  127. max_length=256,
  128. verbose_name=_('Title'),
  129. help_text=_('The title will also be used for the event URL.'),
  130. )
  132. slug = models.SlugField(
  133. max_length=256,
  134. verbose_name=_('Slug'),
  135. )
  137. description = models.TextField(
  138. max_length=1000,
  139. verbose_name=_('Description'),
  140. blank=True, null=True,
  141. )
  143. start = models.DateTimeField(
  144. default=timezone.now(),
  145. verbose_name=_('Start date'),
  146. )
  148. end = models.DateTimeField(
  149. default=timezone.now() + timezone.timedelta(days=1),
  150. verbose_name=_('End date'),
  151. )
  153. venue = models.CharField(
  154. max_length=100,
  155. verbose_name=_('Venue'),
  156. )
  158. street = models.CharField(
  159. max_length=100,
  160. verbose_name=_('Street'),
  161. blank=True,
  162. )
  164. city = models.CharField(
  165. max_length=100,
  166. verbose_name=_('City'),
  167. blank=True,
  168. )
  170. zip = models.CharField(
  171. max_length=100,
  172. verbose_name=_('ZIP code'),
  173. blank=True,
  174. )
  176. country = models.CharField(
  177. max_length=100,
  178. verbose_name=_('Country'),
  179. blank=True,
  180. )
  182. contact_person = models.CharField(
  183. max_length=100,
  184. verbose_name=_('Contact name'),
  185. blank=True,
  186. )
  188. contact_email = models.EmailField(
  189. verbose_name=_('Contact email'),
  190. blank=True,
  191. )
  193. contact_phone = models.CharField(
  194. max_length=100,
  195. verbose_name=_('Contact phone'),
  196. blank=True,
  197. )
  199. available_seats = models.PositiveIntegerField(
  200. verbose_name=_('Available seats'),
  201. blank=True, null=True,
  202. )
  204. hide_available_seats = models.BooleanField(
  205. default=False,
  206. verbose_name=_('Hide available seat information'),
  207. )
  209. allow_anonymous_rsvp = models.BooleanField(
  210. default=False,
  211. verbose_name=_('Allow anonymous RSVP'),
  212. help_text=_('Even anonymous users can rsvp, without adding any info.'),
  213. )
  215. required_fields = MultiSelectField(
  216. verbose_name=_('Required fields'),
  217. max_length=250, blank=True,
  218. choices=(
  219. ('name', _('Name')),
  220. ('email', _('Email')),
  221. ('phone', _('Phone')),
  222. ),
  223. )
  225. max_seats_per_guest = models.PositiveIntegerField(
  226. blank=True, null=True,
  227. verbose_name=_('Maximum amount of seats per guest'),
  228. )
  230. template_name = models.CharField(
  231. max_length=100,
  232. verbose_name=_('Save as template'),
  233. blank=True,
  234. help_text=_('Save this event as a template to re-use it later.'),
  235. )
  237. is_published = models.BooleanField(
  238. verbose_name=_('is published'),
  239. default=False,
  240. )
  242. def __unicode__(self):
  243. if self.template_name:
  244. return '{0} ({1})'.format(self.template_name, ugettext('Template'))
  245. return '{0} ({1})'.format(self.title, date(self.start))
  247. def save(self, *args, **kwargs):
  248. self.slug = slugify(self.title)
  249. suspects = Event.objects.filter(slug=self.slug)
  250. if suspects.count() > 0 and suspects[0] != self:
  251. while Event.objects.filter(slug=self.slug).count() > 0:
  252. try:
  253. number = int(self.slug[-1])
  254. except ValueError:
  255. self.slug = self.slug + '0'
  256. else:
  257. self.slug = self.slug[:-1] + str(number + 1)
  258. super(Event, self).save(*args, **kwargs)
  260. def get_absolute_url(self, url='rsvp_event_detail'):
  261. return reverse(url, kwargs={
  262. 'slug': self.slug,
  263. 'year': '{0:04d}'.format(self.start.year),
  264. 'month': '{0:02d}'.format(self.start.month),
  265. 'day': '{0:02d}'.format(self.start.day),
  266. })
  268. def get_update_url(self):
  269. return self.get_absolute_url(url='rsvp_event_update')
  271. def get_delete_url(self):
  272. return self.get_absolute_url(url='rsvp_event_delete')
  274. def get_template_url(self):
  275. return reverse('rsvp_event_create_from_template', kwargs={
  276. 'pk': self.pk})
  278. def get_free_seats(self):
  279. reserved = self.guests.all().aggregate(models.Sum('number_of_seats'))
  280. if self.available_seats:
  281. return self.available_seats - int(reserved.get(
  282. 'number_of_seats__sum') or 0)
  283. return _('Unlimited seats available.')
  285. def is_bookable(self):
  286. if self.start < timezone.now():
  287. return False
  288. return True
  291. class Guest(models.Model):
  292. """
  293. Model to create event templates for recurring events etc.
  295. :event: Event to visit.
  296. :user: User model of the guest.
  297. :name: Name of the guest.
  298. :email: Email of the guest.
  299. :phone: Phone number of the guest.
  300. :number_of_seats: Amount of seats to book.
  301. :creation_date: Date of the guest model creation.
  302. :is_attending: If the user is attending or not. Default: True
  303. :message: A response from a potential attendee.
  305. """
  306. event = models.ForeignKey(
  307. 'event_rsvp.Event',
  308. verbose_name=_('Event'),
  309. related_name='guests',
  310. )
  312. user = models.ForeignKey(
  313. 'auth.User',
  314. verbose_name=_('User'),
  315. blank=True, null=True,
  316. )
  318. name = models.CharField(
  319. max_length=50,
  320. verbose_name=_('Name'),
  321. blank=True,
  322. )
  324. email = models.EmailField(
  325. verbose_name=_('Email'),
  326. blank=True,
  327. )
  329. phone = models.CharField(
  330. max_length=50,
  331. verbose_name=_('Phone'),
  332. blank=True,
  333. )
  335. number_of_seats = models.PositiveIntegerField(
  336. verbose_name=_('Number of seats'),
  337. blank=True, null=True,
  338. )
  340. creation_date = models.DateTimeField(
  341. auto_now_add=True,
  342. verbose_name=_('Creation date'),
  343. )
  345. is_attending = models.BooleanField(
  346. verbose_name=_('Attending'),
  347. default=True,
  348. )
  350. message = models.TextField(
  351. verbose_name=_('Message'),
  352. max_length=4000,
  353. blank=True,
  354. )
  356. def __unicode__(self):
  357. if self.user:
  358. return '{0} - {1}'.format(
  359. self.user.get_full_name() or self.user.email, self.event)
  360. elif self.name or self.email:
  361. return '{0} - {1}'.format(self.name or self.email, self.event)
  362. return '{0} - {1}'.format(ugettext('anonymous'), self.event)
